RDPDFLib.pdf

Interface PDFViewListener

  • RDPDFLib.pdf.PDFViewListener

  • public interface PDFViewListener
    Interface for dealing with System.IO.Stream

    • Method Summary

      • Methods 
        Modifier and Type Method and Description
        bool Writeable()
        Invoked to get if the stream is writeable
        long long GetLength()
        Invoked to get length of the stream
        long long GetPosition()
        Invoked to get current position in the stream
        bool SetPosition(long long pos)
        Invoked to set position in the stream
        int Read(WriteOnlyArray<BYTE>^ buf)
        Invoked to read stream into a byte array
        int Write(const Array<BYTE>^ buf)
        Invoked to write into the stream from a byte array
        void Close()
        Invoked to close the stream
        void Flush()
        Invoke to flush changes into the stream

    • Method Detail

      • Writeable

        bool Writeable();
        Invoked to get if the stream is writeable
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        True if the stream is writeable, otherwise false

      • GetLength

        long long GetLength();
        Invoked to get length of the stream
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        Length of the stream

      • GetPosition

        long long GetPosition();
        Invoked to get current position in the stream
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        Current position in the stream

      • SetPosition

        bool SetPosition(long long pos);
        Invoked to set position in the stream
        Parameters:
        pos - Position for next read action. Must be less than the stream length
        Returns:
        True if successed, otherwise false

      • Read

        int Read(WriteOnlyArray<BYTE>^ buf);
        Invoked to read stream into a byte array
        Parameters:
        buf - A buffer for read out content
        Returns:
        Length of the data read from the stream

      • Write

        int Write(const Array<BYTE>^ buf);
        Invoked to write into the stream from a byte array
        Parameters:
        buf - A buffer for content which will be written into the stream
         
        Returns:
        Length of the data wrote into the stream
